description: Administrator should use the delet button removing one question from the list shown in the table
name: Show Edit Button - Multiple Choice Question

elements.name: Should edit the question from the list shown in the table.

steps.name: Fill the login form and click on the login button
The user should be logged in successfully
Click on the test management tab
Question Management Service should be accessible
User edits each of questions in the table.
